meanings.definition: Relating to the composition and arrangement of dance movements.
meanings.sent1: The choreographic performance was graceful and well-coordinated.
meanings.sent2: She studied choreographic techniques to improve her dance routine.
meanings.sent3: The choreographic steps seemed to have a mind of their own, leading the dancers effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: Her choreographic skills painted a beautiful picture on the stage.
meanings.sent5: The choreographic precision of their movements left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: Involving the creation and organization of dance sequences.
meanings.sent1: The choreographic process required careful planning and creativity.
meanings.sent2: They worked together to develop a stunning choreographic piece.
meanings.sent3: The choreographic collaboration between the dancers resulted in a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a choreographic workshop, constantly crafting new routines.
meanings.sent5: The choreographic vision of the choreographer brought the dance to life on stage.
